valid_commits.name: valid_api_feature
valid_commits.message:
feat(api): add user profile endpoint

Contracts: [SQL:F, API:T, DB:F, 3RD:F, FEAT:T, INFRA:F]

[WHY]
Users need to view and update their profile information.

[WHAT]
- File(s): src/api/profile.js - Added GET /api/v1/users/:id/profile
- File(s): House_Rules_Contracts/API_CONTRACT.md - Documented endpoint
- File(s): House_Rules_Contracts/FEATURES_CONTRACT.md - Added feature

Resolves: #123
Part of: House Rules Contract System

valid_commits.name: valid_database_change
valid_commits.message:
feat(database): add user preferences table

Contracts: [SQL:T, API:F, DB:T, 3RD:F, FEAT:F, INFRA:F]

[WHY]
Need to store user notification and UI preferences.

[WHAT]
- File(s): migrations/003_add_preferences.sql - Created preferences table
- File(s): House_Rules_Contracts/DATABASE_SCHEMA_CONTRACT.md - Documented schema
- File(s): House_Rules_Contracts/SQL_CONTRACT.json - Added queries

Resolves: #456

valid_commits.name: valid_integration
valid_commits.message:
feat(integration): add Twilio SMS integration

Contracts: [SQL:F, API:F, DB:F, 3RD:T, FEAT:T, INFRA:T]

[WHY]
Need to send SMS notifications to users.

[WHAT]
- File(s): src/integrations/TwilioClient.js - Created Twilio binding module
- File(s): House_Rules_Contracts/THIRD_PARTY_INTEGRATIONS.md - Documented integration
- File(s): House_Rules_Contracts/FEATURES_CONTRACT.md - Added SMS feature
- File(s): House_Rules_Contracts/INFRA_CONTRACT.md - Added TWILIO_API_KEY env var

Resolves: #789
